description: Provides detailed information about a scheduled query.

parameters.name: ScheduledQueryArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the scheduled query.

nested_items.name: ScheduledQuery
nested_items.description: The scheduled query.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: Scheduled query ARN.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name of the scheduled query.

nested_items.name: QueryString
nested_items.description: The query to be run.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: Creation time of the scheduled query.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: State of the scheduled query.

nested_items.name: PreviousInvocationTime
nested_items.description: Last time the query was run.

nested_items.name: NextInvocationTime
nested_items.description: The next time the scheduled query is scheduled to run.

nested_items.name: ScheduleConfiguration
nested_items.description: Schedule configuration.

nested_items.name: ScheduleExpression
nested_items.description: An expression that denotes when to trigger the scheduled query run. This can be a cron expression or a rate expression.

nested_items.name: NotificationConfiguration
nested_items.description: Notification configuration.

nested_items.name: SnsConfiguration
nested_items.description: Details about the Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) configuration. This field is visible only when SNS Topic is provided when updating the account settings.

nested_items.name: TopicArn
nested_items.description: SNS topic ARN that the scheduled query status notifications will be sent to.

nested_items.name: TargetConfiguration
nested_items.description: Scheduled query target store configuration.

nested_items.name: TimestreamConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration needed to write data into the Timestream database and table.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: Name of Timestream database to which the query result will be written.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: Name of Timestream table that the query result will be written to. The table should be within the same database that is provided in Timestream configuration.

nested_items.name: TimeColumn
nested_items.description: Column from query result that should be used as the time column in destination table. Column type for this should be TIMESTAMP.

nested_items.name: DimensionMappings
nested_items.description: This is to allow mapping column(s) from the query result to the dimension in the destination table.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Column name from query result.

nested_items.name: DimensionValueType
nested_items.description: Type for the dimension.

nested_items.name: MultiMeasureMappings
nested_items.description: Multi-measure mappings.

nested_items.name: TargetMultiMeasureName
nested_items.description: The name of the target multi-measure name in the derived table. This input is required when measureNameColumn is not provided. If MeasureNameColumn is provided, then value from that column will be used as multi-measure name.

nested_items.name: MultiMeasureAttributeMappings
nested_items.description: Required. Attribute mappings to be used for mapping query results to ingest data for multi-measure attributes.

nested_items.name: SourceColumn
nested_items.description: Source column from where the attribute value is to be read.

nested_items.name: TargetMultiMeasureAttributeName
nested_items.description: Custom name to be used for attribute name in derived table. If not provided, source column name would be used.

nested_items.name: MeasureValueType
nested_items.description: Type of the attribute to be read from the source column.

nested_items.name: MixedMeasureMappings
nested_items.description: Specifies how to map measures to multi-measure records.

nested_items.name: MeasureName
nested_items.description: Refers to the value of measure_name in a result row. This field is required if MeasureNameColumn is provided.

nested_items.name: SourceColumn
nested_items.description: This field refers to the source column from which measure-value is to be read for result materialization.

nested_items.name: TargetMeasureName
nested_items.description: Target measure name to be used. If not provided, the target measure name by default would be measure-name if provided, or sourceColumn otherwise.

nested_items.name: MeasureValueType
nested_items.description: Type of the value that is to be read from sourceColumn. If the mapping is for MULTI, use MeasureValueType.MULTI.

nested_items.name: MultiMeasureAttributeMappings
nested_items.description: Required when measureValueType is MULTI. Attribute mappings for MULTI value measures.

nested_items.name: SourceColumn
nested_items.description: Source column from where the attribute value is to be read.

nested_items.name: TargetMultiMeasureAttributeName
nested_items.description: Custom name to be used for attribute name in derived table. If not provided, source column name would be used.

nested_items.name: MeasureValueType
nested_items.description: Type of the attribute to be read from the source column.

nested_items.name: MeasureNameColumn
nested_items.description: Name of the measure column.

nested_items.name: ScheduledQueryExecutionRoleArn
nested_items.description: IAM role that Timestream uses to run the schedule query.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: A customer provided KMS key used to encrypt the scheduled query resource.

nested_items.name: ErrorReportConfiguration
nested_items.description: Error-reporting configuration for the scheduled query.

nested_items.name: S3Configuration
nested_items.description: The S3 configuration for the error reports.

nested_items.name: BucketName
nested_items.description: Name of the S3 bucket under which error reports will be created.

nested_items.name: ObjectKeyPrefix
nested_items.description: Prefix for the error report key. Timestream by default adds the following prefix to the error report path.

nested_items.name: EncryptionOption
nested_items.description: Encryption at rest options for the error reports. If no encryption option is specified, Timestream will choose SSE_S3 as default.

nested_items.name: LastRunSummary
nested_items.description: Runtime summary for the last scheduled query run.

nested_items.name: InvocationTime
nested_items.description: InvocationTime for this run. This is the time at which the query is scheduled to run. Parameter @scheduled_runtime can be used in the query to get the value.

nested_items.name: TriggerTime
nested_items.description: The actual time when the query was run.

nested_items.name: RunStatus
nested_items.description: The status of a scheduled query run.

nested_items.name: ExecutionStats
nested_items.description: Runtime statistics for a scheduled run.

nested_items.name: ExecutionTimeInMillis
nested_items.description: Total time, measured in milliseconds, that was needed for the scheduled query run to complete.

nested_items.name: DataWrites
nested_items.description: Data writes metered for records ingested in a single scheduled query run.

nested_items.name: BytesMetered
nested_items.description: Bytes metered for a single scheduled query run.

nested_items.name: CumulativeBytesScanned
nested_items.description: Bytes scanned for a single scheduled query run.

nested_items.name: RecordsIngested
nested_items.description: The number of records ingested for a single scheduled query run.

nested_items.name: QueryResultRows
nested_items.description: Number of rows present in the output from running a query before ingestion to destination data source.

nested_items.name: QueryInsightsResponse
nested_items.description: Provides various insights and metrics related to the run summary of the scheduled query.

nested_items.name: QuerySpatialCoverage
nested_items.description: Provides insights into the spatial coverage of the query, including the table with sub-optimal (max) spatial pruning. This information can help you identify areas for improvement in your partitioning strategy to enhance spatial pruning.
Value --- The maximum ratio of spatial coverage.
TableArn --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table with sub-optimal spatial pruning.
PartitionKey --- The partition key used for partitioning, which can be a default measure_name or a CDPK.

nested_items.name: QueryTemporalRange
nested_items.description: Provides insights into the temporal range of the query, including the table with the largest (max) time range. Following are some of the potential options for optimizing time-based pruning:
Add missing time-predicates.
Remove functions around the time predicates.
Add time predicates to all the sub-queries.

nested_items.name: QueryTableCount
nested_items.description: Indicates the number of tables in the query.

nested_items.name: OutputRows
nested_items.description: Indicates the total number of rows returned as part of the query result set. You can use this data to validate if the number of rows in the result set have changed as part of the query tuning exercise.

nested_items.name: OutputBytes
nested_items.description: Indicates the size of query result set in bytes. You can use this data to validate if the result set has changed as part of the query tuning exercise.

nested_items.name: ErrorReportLocation
nested_items.description: S3 location for error report.

nested_items.name: S3ReportLocation
nested_items.description: The S3 location where error reports are written.

nested_items.name: BucketName
nested_items.description: S3 bucket name.

nested_items.name: ObjectKey
nested_items.description: S3 key.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: Error message for the scheduled query in case of failure. You might have to look at the error report to get more detailed error reasons.

nested_items.name: RecentlyFailedRuns
nested_items.description: Runtime summary for the last five failed scheduled query runs.

nested_items.name: InvocationTime
nested_items.description: InvocationTime for this run. This is the time at which the query is scheduled to run. Parameter @scheduled_runtime can be used in the query to get the value.

nested_items.name: TriggerTime
nested_items.description: The actual time when the query was run.

nested_items.name: RunStatus
nested_items.description: The status of a scheduled query run.

nested_items.name: ExecutionStats
nested_items.description: Runtime statistics for a scheduled run.

nested_items.name: ExecutionTimeInMillis
nested_items.description: Total time, measured in milliseconds, that was needed for the scheduled query run to complete.

nested_items.name: DataWrites
nested_items.description: Data writes metered for records ingested in a single scheduled query run.

nested_items.name: BytesMetered
nested_items.description: Bytes metered for a single scheduled query run.

nested_items.name: CumulativeBytesScanned
nested_items.description: Bytes scanned for a single scheduled query run.

nested_items.name: RecordsIngested
nested_items.description: The number of records ingested for a single scheduled query run.

nested_items.name: QueryResultRows
nested_items.description: Number of rows present in the output from running a query before ingestion to destination data source.

nested_items.name: QueryInsightsResponse
nested_items.description: Provides various insights and metrics related to the run summary of the scheduled query.

nested_items.name: QuerySpatialCoverage
nested_items.description: Provides insights into the spatial coverage of the query, including the table with sub-optimal (max) spatial pruning. This information can help you identify areas for improvement in your partitioning strategy to enhance spatial pruning.
Value --- The maximum ratio of spatial coverage.
TableArn --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table with sub-optimal spatial pruning.
PartitionKey --- The partition key used for partitioning, which can be a default measure_name or a CDPK.

nested_items.name: QueryTemporalRange
nested_items.description: Provides insights into the temporal range of the query, including the table with the largest (max) time range. Following are some of the potential options for optimizing time-based pruning:
Add missing time-predicates.
Remove functions around the time predicates.
Add time predicates to all the sub-queries.

nested_items.name: QueryTableCount
nested_items.description: Indicates the number of tables in the query.

nested_items.name: OutputRows
nested_items.description: Indicates the total number of rows returned as part of the query result set. You can use this data to validate if the number of rows in the result set have changed as part of the query tuning exercise.

nested_items.name: OutputBytes
nested_items.description: Indicates the size of query result set in bytes. You can use this data to validate if the result set has changed as part of the query tuning exercise.

nested_items.name: ErrorReportLocation
nested_items.description: S3 location for error report.

nested_items.name: S3ReportLocation
nested_items.description: The S3 location where error reports are written.

nested_items.name: BucketName
nested_items.description: S3 bucket name.

nested_items.name: ObjectKey
nested_items.description: S3 key.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: Error message for the scheduled query in case of failure. You might have to look at the error report to get more detailed error reasons.
